problem.markdown:
The paragraph contains references to sleepiness and an unexpected event. Why?
( ) Feeling sleepy can cause white rabbits to appear. ( ) There is foreshadowing of a tea party. (x) There is an implication that the strangeness to follow can be considered like a dream.
problem.p: The paragraph contains references to sleepiness and an unexpected event. Why?

choicegroup.choice: Feeling sleepy can cause white rabbits to appear.
There is foreshadowing of a tea party.
There is an implication that the strangeness to follow can be considered like a dream.
